exceptions.exn: In environment G : AbelianGroup m, n : nat A : matrix m n Unable to unify "mk_matrix ?m ?n (coeff_mat ?M2435 ?M2436) = ?M2436" with "mk_matrix m n (fun i j : nat => plus (coeff_mat zero A i j) (coeff_mat zero (mk_matrix m n (fun _ _ : nat => zero)) i j)) = A".
The LHS of Nat.add_0_r (_ + 0)%nat does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of plus_zero_r (plus _ zero) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment G : AbelianGroup m, n : nat A : matrix m n H : forall (x0 : ?T) (A0 : matrix n n), mk_matrix n n (coeff_mat x0 A0) = A0 H0 : forall (x0 : ?T0) (A0 : matrix n n), mk_matrix n n (coeff_mat x0 A0) = A0 H2 : forall x : G, plus x zero = x H1 : forall (x0 : ?T1) (A0 : matrix n n), mk_matrix n n (coeff_mat x0 A0) = A0 Unable to unify "A" with "mk_matrix m n (fun i j : nat => plus (coeff_Tn zero (coeff_Tn (mk_Tn n (fun _ : nat => zero)) A i) j) (coeff_Tn zero (coeff_Tn (mk_Tn n (fun _ : nat => zero)) (mk_matrix m n (fun _ _ : nat => zero)) i) j))".

original: intros A. unfold Mplus, Mzero. apply mk_matrix_bij. intros i j. unfold coeff_mat. rewrite Nat.add_0_r. rewrite plus_zero_r. reflexivity.
